import React from "react"; import styles from "./About.module.css"; // import UpMargin from "../components/UpMargin"; const About = () => { const TITLE = [ "HELLO", "안녕하세요", "Hallo", "Bonjour", "こんにちは", "你好", "Привет", "مرحبا", "Ciao", "Halo", ]; let hi = { title: "", }; function changeMents() { let randomNumber = Math.random(); let ments = TITLE[Math.floor(randomNumber * 9)]; hi.title = ments; console.log(ments); } setInterval(changeMents, 3000); console.log(hi); return (

{`[ ${hi.title} ]`}
